title: Medieval Warfare Sound Pack
description: Medieval Warfare Sound Effects Bundle brings the most realistic medieval sound effects that you may need for your project.
longDescription:
Medieval Warfare Sound Effects Bundle brings the most realistic medieval sound effects that you may need for your project. It includes sound effects of; barn animals, horse sound effects, medieval life sound effects, weapon and tools, and much more to find out.


With the Medieval Warfare Sound Effects Bundle, you will have access to weapon sound effects, animals, horse items, ambiences, medieval life items, sword hits, catapult, crossbow, arrow whooshes, battle cries, castle gates, foley sound effects and more. Medieval Warfare Sound Effects Bundle is specifically designed for all your historical needs. This bundle covers all your sound effects needs for any medieval game or project that you are working on.
